list_definition.definition: the spirit; the non-physical part of a person, which is often thought to continue in existence after he or she dies

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: People often discuss whether animals and plants have souls.

list_definition.definition: (of an enterprise etc) the organizer or leader

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He is the soul of the whole movement.
Her music mixes elements of soul and jazz.
